<<<<<<< HEAD A man struggling with his faith is haunted by the sins of his past but is suddenly thrust into the role of defending humanity from the gathering forces of darkness. 8.2 40 ======= Based on the DC Comics series "Hellblazer", this series focuses on seasoned Demon Hunter and Master of The Occult John Constantine, a Dark Magician who is struggling with his past sins as he tries to protect humanity from a gathering supernatural threat. Constantine specializes in giving Hell…hell. Neil Marshall 2 Non Est Asylum 1 2014-10-24 Jeremy Davies|Lucy Griffiths tt3807952 en Constantine has checked himself into Ravenscar Asylum following the loss of a 9-year-old girl, Astra to the demon Nergal. The loss of her soul, along with his own, has been tormenting him. Naturally, he'll have to snap out of it. That moment comes six months later when a possessing spirit sends him a disturbing message. John is on a mission to save the daughter of a friend who is being targeted by a demonic antagonist.
7.3 22 1 Daniel Cerone|David Goyer 1 episodes/273690/4859540.jpg 1414708200 583150 273690 2014-06-30 10:29:02 225 400

Episode.Overview: Deep in the mountains of Western Pennsylvania, John is a small mining community's only defense against an ancient Welsh spirit. In the course of protecting these isolated innocents, John finds a vital new ally in a mysterious young woman named Zed.

Episode.GuestStars: |Max Charles|Niall Matter|Laura Regan|Amy Parrish|Myke Holmes|Nick Madrick|Deborah Ayorinde|Christa Beth Campbell|Sean Freeland|Elyse Dufour|Michael E. Sanders|Chuck Borden|Alan T. Coleman|Swift Rice|Kendall McIntyre|Alan T. Coleman Jr.|
Episode.Overview: When a young boy is taken over by a malevolent spirit, John must put aside his misgivings over exorcising a child and convince the parents that their boy is not all that he seems.

Episode.GuestStars: |Patrick Carroll|David A. Gregory|Juliana Harkavy|Megan West|Christopher Johnson|Mann Alfonso|Stephanie Adelheid Albanese|Jody Thompson|Terry Dale Parks|Marty Stonerock|Charles Green|Bill Murphey|
Episode.Overview: While in art class, Zed has a bizarre vision of snakes that lead her and John to a small town where a preacher has mysteriously gained the ability to heal his congregation.

Episode.GuestStars: |Claire van der Boom|Jose Pablo Cantillo|David A. Gregory|Ivette Li-Sanchez|Brandon Larracuente|Mann Alfonso|Janelle Maria|Nelson Bonilla|Paloma Guzman|Teresa Yenque|Ivette Li-Sanchez|Janelle Maria|
Episode.Overview: A call from Anne Marie, a member of the fateful Newcastle crew, sends John and Chas to Mexico City and brings them closer to the source of The Rising Darkness. Meanwhile, Zed's past comes back to haunt her.
